uvi.description:
net:sfc: fix non-freed irq in legacy irq mode

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.44 by commit 8d717c9135a3340ae62d1699484850bfb4112b0c. For more details please see the references link.
